# After inserting 5 units of Coal into the Stone Furnace, it is now operational again. The furnace has 1 unit of Copper Ore remaining and has produced a total of 16 Copper Plates. 
# The fuel count has increased to 17 units of Coal, which should allow the furnace to continue smelting.

# I will now wait for the last unit of Copper Ore to be processed into a Copper Plate. 
# I will check the inventory of the Stone Furnace again after a brief wait to confirm the outcome.

for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(stone_furnace_entity)[Prototype.CopperPlate] >= 17:  # Check if 17 Copper Plates are produced.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# After waiting, I'll check my inventory to confirm the number of Copper Plates produced now.
print(f"Inventory after waiting for smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Checking inventory after waiting for smelting to complete.
